name: merlin-sysbio
short_description: merlin is an user-friendly Java application that performs the reconstruction of genome-scale metabolic models for any organism that has its genome sequenced. It performs several steps of the reconstruction process, including the functional genomic annotations of the whole genome. Moreover, merlin includes tools for the identification and annotation of transport proteins encoding genes, as well as the generation of transport reactions for such carriers. Also, merlin includes tools for the compartmentation of the model that predict the localisation of the proteins encoded in the genome, and thus the localisation of the metabolites involved in the reactions induced by such proteins. Finally, merlin expedites the transition from genome-scale data to SBML metabolic models, allowing the user to have a preliminary view of the biochemical network.
